title: account has been stolen
body: I was AFK for a while. Today I would like to log in again my game account and find the password wrong, and then I use my girlfriend's account login to the game and found someone to steal my game account, and change my account email.How can i take back my account?!

replies.body: Not a fun thing to come back to!  :(  Hit us up in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help you out.  I have to advise you to stop account sharing, though, it's not something we support and one of the most common reasons accounts get accessed by an unauthorized party.  Keep your info safe and secure!  We'll see you in your ticket!
